price: 69. Allah jugera bien vos différends au Jour de la Résurrection. »
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كُنتُمۡ فِيهِ تَخۡتَلِفُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaḥkumu baynakum yawma al-qiyāmati fīmā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūna
